titles.title: Rural Information Technology Investment Act
To authorize the Secretary of Labor to make grants for the establishment of information technology centers in rural areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
4/8/2008--Introduced.
Rural Information Technology Investment Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Labor to make grants to small businesses or not-for-profit organziations operating in rural areas to establish information technology centers.
